snippet: The Orthodox Jewish community tends to focus on social services like busing and housing but votes conservative on issues like same-sex marriage.
abstract: Influence of Orthodox Jewish community on New York City and State elections is significant; community tends to focus on social services like busing and housing but tends to be conservative on social issues like same-sex marriage.
lead_paragraph: The Orthodox Jewish community tends to focus on social services like busing and housing but votes conservative on issues like same-sex marriage.

headline.seo: The Powers of New York: Brooklyn’s Orthodox Jews
